election.tally
Class BallotBox

java.lang.Object
  election.tally.BallotBox

public class BallotBox
extends java.lang.Object

Data transfer structure for set of all valid ballots

Field Summary
protected  Ballot[] ballots
          List of valid ballot papers, already shuffled and mixed by the data loader or returning officer.
protected  int index
          Number of ballots copied from box
protected  int numberOfBallots
          The total number of ballots in this ballot box.
